overview:
David Rashty, an entrepreneur and one of the early web pioneers, has over twenty yearsâ€™ experience as a CTO and a CEO. He has been involved in several start-ups and established companies and was the founder of two successful ventures.

David is currently using his proven leadership and management skills to act as a Part Time CTO or “JumpStart” CTO for several early-stage ventures; this includes helping them design and develop their product and IT infrastructure.

David holds a BS in computer science and an M.Sc in educational technology. His specialties are in the fields of Web Technologies, Product Development, Information Architecture, User Experience and E-Learning.

He has been a adjunct university professor, given numerous workshops, written several books and articles on information technology and received numerous innovation awards
